attributes.action: sort out refuse collection in your area
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Adopt the French system of having a large skip at the end of the street that is emptied every day. 
It is not adequate for flats without gardens to store house hold rubbish in their flats for a week. This is not a hygienic system for the community.

rejection.details: Please rewrite the title of your petition to include details about how your would like refuse to be deal with differently.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
